body_html:
@CynthiaProtector hello, i encountered the same problem and i haven't found the solution. I want to know if you run on MacOS? because when i try to install libibverbs-dev on mac, it turns:
$ pip3 install libibverbs-dev
Collecting libibverbs-dev
Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement libibverbs-dev (from versions: )
No matching distribution found for libibverbs-dev
thanks very much.

body:
@CynthiaProtector hello, i encountered the same problem and i haven't found the solution. I want to know if you run on MacOS? because when i try to install  libibverbs-dev on mac, it turns:
$ pip3 install libibverbs-dev
Collecting libibverbs-dev
  Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement libibverbs-dev (from versions: )
No matching distribution found for libibverbs-dev
thanks very much.
